thread.title: Red Flags Are Suddenly Soaring in Markets

author: Richard Barley
title: Red Flags Are Suddenly Soaring in Markets
text:
Risk aversion is back. Italy is the focal point, with its bond market in meltdown, its politics in crisis after President Sergio Mattarellablocked the formation of an antiestablishment government, and its credit rating under threat.
That is all now making bigger waves: Europeâ€™s deepening troubles and disappointing global growth signals are sparking a sudden rally in haven bonds like U.S. Treasurys.
